title: The Lintz Disclosure
story_summary: Oksana releases the hidden records of BCI abuse. The truth spreads fast and shocks the city. People crowd the streets demanding justice and apologies. Council members face public anger and must end the old scoring system. Stenograd begins to build new ways to remember and repair the harm.

official.headline: Community Reflection
official.anchor_line: Open forums welcome citizens to share experiences and contribute to public understanding.
official.contextual_reframing: Civic assemblies promote open dialogue. The city values every voice in building collective resilience.

official.headline: Orderly Transition
official.anchor_line: Council announces new oversight frameworks as centralized scoring is retired for greater fairness.
official.contextual_reframing: Governance adapts efficiently. System reforms prioritize clarity, equity, and responsible progress.

official.headline: Archive Released
official.anchor_line: The full BCI archive goes public as part of ongoing transparency and accountability efforts.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparency strengthens social trust. The Directorate reaffirms its pledge to justice and forward-looking correction.

underground.headline: Denied At The Gate
underground.anchor_line: Another day, another family blocked from transit after BCI flagged their score.
underground.contextual_reframing: Neighbors are asking why algorithms decide who gets home. Leaked logs show people stuck for hours and no answers from officials.

underground.headline: Empty Promises
underground.anchor_line: Council scraps the scoring system, but survivors say truth must come before trust.
underground.contextual_reframing: Citizens demand action, not scripted apologies. Justice is in our hands now - remember every name lost to cold automation.

underground.headline: Truth Unleashed
underground.anchor_line: The full BCI abuse files are out. Everyone knows someone hurt by this system now.
underground.contextual_reframing: No more secrets. The data is damning - demand repair, answers, and a real reckoning. Stenograd will not forget.
